      • getZapped

        public boolean getZapped()
        TODO Handles the situation where a Cell is zapped (by a ray or an exploding robot). Zapping vaporizes (no rubble) everything except PermanentRock (which isn't effected. Returns true if and only if the value of the cell should be changed to null. The PC is killed by a zap.
        Specified by:
        getZapped in class Cell
        Returns:
        Whether or not the cell should be nullified

      • getHit

        public Cell getHit(Tableau t,
                   Robot by)
        Handles the situation where a Cell is hit by a (non-exploding) robot. Getting hit will leave rock or rubble if cell was rock or rubble, will leave rubble if cell was a robot. Will cause an explosion if cell is exploding robot. Returns the value that should be placed in cell after hit, and marks the PC as dead.
        Specified by:
        getHit in class Cell
        Parameters:
        t - The tableau
        by - The thing doing the hitting
        Returns:
        New value for cell

      • removable

        public boolean removable()
        Signals whether or not a cell can be removed (from Tableau's robot list). Robots return true; everything else false. The PC should be marked dead.
        Overrides:
        removable in class Cell
        Returns:
        false
